title: What to do with a dollar
brief_description: The State Savings Bank is closely linked with the development of Victoria. It seeks to use the dollars at its disposal for the maximum benefit of the people of Victoria. Through loan money it helps provide power, water suppl7, roads, port facilities, housing loans and rural loans.
